container.name: Container
container.description: A container with a maximum width of $screen-lg-max

markup.escaped: <div class="container"></div>

pull left.name: Pull left
pull left.description: Floats an element to the left edge of the container.

markup.modifier: Floating to the left
markup.example: Floating to the left
markup.escaped:
<div class="pull-left">Floating to the left</div>
<div class="clearfix"></div>

pull right.name: Pull right
pull right.description: Floats an element to the right edge of the container.

markup.modifier: Floating to the right
markup.example: Floating to the right
markup.escaped:
<div class="pull-right">Floating to the right</div>
<div class="clearfix"></div>

clearfix.name: Clearfix
clearfix.description: Used to clear floats. Can be used either on a div after a floated element or directly on the container.

markup.escaped: <div class="clearfix"></div>

grid.name: Grid
grid.description:
HbgPrime's grid system is a 12 column responsive grid.
ATTENTION: Remove the .grid-example class before using.

markup.modifier:
grid-md-3
grid-md-9
markup.example:
grid-md-3
grid-md-9

article.name: Article
article.description: A full article with heading, lead and body text

link item.name: Link item
link item.description: Prepends a link indicator icon before the link text.

state.name: .link-item-outbound
state.description: Will show icon for outbound link instead of regular link item arrow

state.name: .link-item-light
state.description: Lighter link item icon and text color (for use with dark backgrounds)

markup.modifier:
Inbound link item
Outbound link item
markup.example:
Inbound link item
Outbound link item
markup.escaped:
<a href="#" class="link-item">Inbound link item</a><br>
<a href="#" class="link-item link-item-outbound">Outbound link item</a>

accordion.name: Accordion
accordion.description:
CSS-only solution for toggeling content section visibility.
Note: You can use either checkbox or radio-button in your sections. Radio-button will only allow one opened section while checkbox will allow multiple.

state.name: .accordion-icon
state.description: Use plus/minus signs to indicate toggaleable element

state.name: .accordion-list
state.description: Show accordion as list (with alternating colors)

markup.modifier:

This is the content of the second accordion section
This is the content of the third accordion section
This is the content of the fourth accordion section

base.name: Button base
base.description: The button base with modifiers that can be applied on all types of buttons. The .btn class can be used on button and a elements.

<button class="btn disabled">Button base</button>

<button class="btn disabled">Button base</button>

input group.name: Input group
input group.description: Grouped input combination. Use .input-group-addon to append text or use .input-group-addon-btn to append buttons.

markup.modifier:
<select name="places" id="places">
    <option value="Sundstorget">Sundstorget</option>
    <option value="Stortorget">Stortorget</option>
    <option value="Gustav Adolfs torg">Gustav Adolfs torg</option>
    <option value="Hamntorget">Hamntorget</option>
    <option value="Kungstorget">Kungstorget</option>
    <option value="Henry Dunkers plats">Henry Dunkers plats</option>
</select>
<select name="places" id="places" disabled>
    <option value="Sundstorget">Sundstorget</option>
    <option value="Stortorget">Stortorget</option>
    <option value="Gustav Adolfs torg">Gustav Adolfs torg</option>
    <option value="Hamntorget">Hamntorget</option>
    <option value="Kungstorget">Kungstorget</option>
    <option value="Henry Dunkers plats">Henry Dunkers plats</option>
</select>
<select name="places" id="places" multiple>
    <option value="Sundstorget">Sundstorget</option>
    <option value="Stortorget">Stortorget</option>
    <option value="Gustav Adolfs torg">Gustav Adolfs torg</option>
    <option value="Hamntorget">Hamntorget</option>
    <option value="Kungstorget">Kungstorget</option>
    <option value="Henry Dunkers plats">Henry Dunkers plats</option>
</select>

navbar.description: The navbar is typically used for the main menu. Using the class .nav-justify on the ul element will make the menu items fill the width of the navbar container.

general.name: Stripe
general.description:
The iconic Helsingborg brand stripe.
ATTENTION: Do not use the gray stripe, it's only for demonstration purpose.
general.author: Kristoffer Svanmark
